summary.span: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

span.span: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和不通常会使用在 XAML 中，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 此示例演示如何确定如果两个结构是相等使用静态方法。This example shows how to determine if two structures are equal using the static method. 下面的代码演示如何检查是否相等的结构。The following code illustrates how to check structures for equality. 结构是声明并分配值。The structures are declared and assigned values. 方法然后用于确定两个结构是否相等。The method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal.
